item.title: Grace add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Grace add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Grace add a quote by Kofi Anan
item.description: "Literacy is a bridge from misery to hope." -- Kofi Anan

item.title: Grace add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "I don't want to lose the boy with the bread." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Grace add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You love me. Real or not real?" I tell him, "Real." -- Suzanne Collins
